title: Shady Or Not: Is The Guy She's Dating Sweet Or Creepy For Doing *This* Online?
description:
You connected with someone, and you two started dating. But they’ve done something that makes you question their character. And now you’re not certain if you should continue dating them or not – and that’s where we come in! Tell us your situation, and we’ll tell you if their offense is shady or not.
The guy she's been dating for the last three weeks seemed normal to her until she started to research his social media profiles. She noticed that he was following all of her friends.
If he doesn't personally know her friends, why would he be following them? Is this a red flag or not?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
